description: Utility helper functions for chart data transformations and percentage formatting, including total computation, percentage formatting, and CSS gradient generation.

methods.name: computeTotal(data)
methods.description: Calculates the total sum from a dataset provided as an object map or array of numbers.

methods.name: computePercentage(value, total, precision = 1)
methods.description: Calculates and formats a percentage string given a value and total, with precision control.

methods.name: conicGradient(keys, dataMap, total = null, colorResolver = (i)=>'#10B981')
methods.description: Generates a CSS conic-gradient string based on provided keys, data values, total, and a color resolver function.

ctags.name: conicGradient
ctags.pattern: /^export function conicGradient(keys, dataMap, total = null, colorResolver = (i)=>'#10B981') {$/
